com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.cache

Class SimpleCacheSpan

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.cache.CacheSpan
      • com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.cache.SimpleCacheSpan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<CacheSpan> 

    final class SimpleCacheSpan
extends CacheSpan
    This class stores span metadata in filename.

      • createCacheEntry

        public static SimpleCacheSpan createCacheEntry(java.io.File file,
                                               CachedContentIndex index)
        Creates a cache span from an underlying cache file. Upgrades the file if necessary.
        Parameters:
        file - The cache file.
        index - Cached content index.
        Returns:
        The span, or null if the file name is not correctly formatted, or if the id is not present in the content index.

      • upgradeFile

        private static java.io.File upgradeFile(java.io.File file,
                                        CachedContentIndex index)

      • copyWithUpdatedLastAccessTime

        public SimpleCacheSpan copyWithUpdatedLastAccessTime(int id)
        Returns a copy of this CacheSpan whose last access time stamp is set to current time. This doesn't copy or change the underlying cache file.
        Parameters:
        id - The cache file id.
        Returns:
        A SimpleCacheSpan with updated last access time stamp.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If called on a non-cached span (i.e. CacheSpan.isCached is false).
